original_text: Then Hiram the king of Tyre answered in a letter that he sent to Solomon, “Because the Lord loves his people, he has made you king over them.”
korean_text: 두로 왕 후람이 솔로몬에게 답장하여 이르되 여호와께서 자기 백성을 사랑하시므로 당신을 세워 그들의 왕을 삼으셨도다

sentences.original_text: Then Hiram the king of Tyre answered in a letter
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 두로 왕 히람이 편지로 답변하여

sentences.original_text: Because the Lord loves his people
he has made you king over them
